Posts.Content: Hello so 3 days ago I when to my gp with 5 weeks of off £ on left Breast stabbing pain & under arm put ache. She felt a pea sized lump around 7o clock area of Breast & about the blue a almond shape thickness area at 3oclock in the right! Reffered me asap and appointment came through for this Monday coming. Now am worried.. I couldn’t feel he lumps before & now I know there I can point to them straight away.. some please give me a little reassurance. Going through radiotherapy with my dad at the moment for throat and tonsil cancer so am so drained.. don’t have menstrual cycle as had a ablation 4 years ago to stop periods.. so don’t have any monthly symptoms any advice would be helpful xx
Posts.Title: Feeling worried about docs referral

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for your reply. Am really praying it’s nothing more than cysts. I do have my Mum who I try to be strong for to aswell as my dad. He also has Alzheimer’s which is making things harder to. I don’t have time to have anything wrong with me. I’ll take a look at the head and neck site now thanks again xx
